Replacing data

replace method sets the given key/value in the cache ONLY IF the key already exists.

Example

await cache.replace('one', 2, new Duration(seconds: 5));

Usage in route

Here is an example showing how to use replace during update operation on a resource.

@Put(path: '/:id')
Future> update(Context ctx) async {
  final String id = ctx.pathParams.id;
  final db = ctx.getInput(MongoDb);
  Book book = await fromJson(ctx, type: Book);
  book.id = id;
  final bean = new BookBean(db);
  await bean.update(book);
  book = await bean.getById(id);
  cache.replace(id, book);
  return toJson(book);
}
>
